Entry.Title: Transactions of the International Astronomical Union, Volume XVIIIB: Proceedings of the Eighteenth General Assembly, Patras 1982

Comments.Comment: R. M. West (Editor). D. Reidel Publishing Company, Dordrecht, Holland— Boston, U.S.A.— London, England. 10+603 pp. Price Dfl. 160.00, US$ 69.50 (1983). ISBN 90-277-1563-7. This volume contains an account of the two sessions of the IAU General Assembly on August 17 and 26, 1983, including the resolutions adopted by the assembly. Reports of meetings of the individual IAU commissions are then given. They are followed by the report of the Executive Committee for the period 1979-1981, presenting among diverse topics the financial budget of the union and a complete list of all IAU publications during that period. The "astronomer's handbook" informs summarily about organization and structure of the IAU, its major services and functions, publications, statutes and working rules. Finally, a list of commission membership and an updated alphabetical list of the approx. 5200 individual members (with detailed addresses) are presented.
